docs.lead_paragraph: LARRY RIVERS is one of the most fascinating personalities of the last 30 years in art, and if you would like to get to know him here's your chance. Besides over 300 reproductions, about a fourth of them in color, this sumptuous volume features an autobiographical text, edited from tapes by Carol ...
